item.description:
Update--

I changed the time after hearing from others who have been in past years that the line is very long. It starts at 11:00, so hopefully that might help keep the line shorter (?). We could definitely consider doing lunch after. The Avon House of Pizza had good reviews on Yahoo or there is Not Your Average Joe's a little further up in Randolph.

 

I've been wanting to do this for a while, so I thought I'd post a Meet-Up. We could go somewhere after for ice cream or whatever if people wanted. Full description below. How many fun things can you do for free??

 

http://www.bostoncentral.com/events/holiday/p10056.php
item.how_to_find_us: Not sure yet; need to investigate

group.name: South Shore Hike, Bike & Social Club

item.name: Enchanted Village at Jordan's Furniture--FREE--great for all ages
